typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SALESORDERID as integer,
		CREATEDBY as string,
		CREATEDAT as string,
		CHANGEDBY as string,
		CHANGEDAT as string,
		FISCVARIANT as string,
		FISCALYEARPERIOD as string,
		NOTEID as string,
		PARTNERID as integer,
		SALESORG as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		GROSSAMOUNT as string,
		NETAMOUNT as decimal(10,2),
		TAXAMOUNT as string,
		LIFECYCLESTATUS as string,
		BILLINGSTATUS as string,
		DELIVERYSTATUS as string,
		ZPART_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> src01SalesHeader
source(output(
		SALESORDERID as integer,
		SALESORDERITEM as integer,
		PRODUCTID as string,
		NOTEID as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		GROSSAMOUNT as string,
		NETAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		TAXAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		ITEMATPSTATUS as string,
		OPITEMPOS as string,
		QUANTITY as integer,
		QUANTITYUNIT as string,
		DELIVERYDATE as string,
		ZPART_YEAR as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> src02SalesItem
src01SalesHeader, src02SalesItem join(src01SalesHeader@SALESORDERID == src02SalesItem@SALESORDERID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jn01Sales
jn01Sales select(mapColumn(
		SALESORDERID = src01SalesHeader@SALESORDERID,
		CREATEDBY,
		FISCALYEARPERIOD,
		PARTNERID,
		CURRENCY = src01SalesHeader@CURRENCY,
		GROSSAMOUNT = src01SalesHeader@GROSSAMOUNT,
		NETAMOUNT = src01SalesHeader@NETAMOUNT,
		TAXAMOUNT = src01SalesHeader@TAXAMOUNT,
		BILLINGSTATUS,
		DELIVERYSTATUS,
		ZPART_YEAR = src01SalesHeader@ZPART_YEAR,
		SALESORDERITEM,
		PRODUCTID,
		GROSSAMOUNT = src02SalesItem@GROSSAMOUNT,
		ITEMNETAMOUNT = src02SalesItem@NETAMOUNT,
		ITEMTAXAMOUNT = src02SalesItem@TAXAMOUNT,
		QUANTITY,
		QUANTITYUNIT,
		DELIVERYDATE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sel01Sales
sel01Sales sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		ZPART_YEAR
	)) ~> snk01Sales
